summary: Convert Policy classes from PHP constants to enum cases for consistency with PHP 8.1+ and modern SDK code practices.
userImpact: Modernizes the SDK API to use PHP 8.1 enums for Policy classes, providing better type safety and consistency with newer SDK code.
rootCause: PHP lacked enumeration support when the SDK was initially released; PHP 8.1+ now provides this feature.
proposedFix: Convert all Policy classes from constants to enum cases for consistency.
resolutionDetails: Policy classes were converted from constants to enums in PHP 8.1+ compatible implementation.
keyQuote: For consistency, all Policy classes should be converted from constants to enums.
